statements: SELECT * FROM Cardiologists;
SELECT name, specialty FROM Cardiologists WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM Cardiologists ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, license_number FROM Cardiologists WHERE specialty = 'Heart Surgery' ORDER BY license_number;
SELECT DISTINCT specialty FROM Cardiologists;
SELECT * FROM Cardiologists WHERE specialty='Cardiology';
SELECT name, specialty FROM Cardiologists ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Cardiologists WHERE specialty='Cardiology' AND license_number LIKE '123%';
SELECT name, specialty, license_number FROM Cardiologists WHERE specialty='Cardiology' ORDER BY license_number DESC;

SELECT name, email FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC
SELECT cardiologist_id, name, specialty FROM Cardiologists WHERE specialty LIKE '%Surgeon%'
SELECT * FROM Cardiologists INNER JOIN Patients ON Cardiologists.cardiologist_id = Patients.patient_id
SELECT * FROM Cardiologists WHERE specialty = 'cardiology';
SELECT name, email FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT specialty, COUNT(*) AS num_cardiologists FROM Cardiologists GROUP BY specialty;

SELECT name, specialty FROM Cardiologists WHERE cardiologist_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM cardiologists ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, specialty FROM cardiologists WHERE experience > 5;

SELECT id, sender_id, receiver_id, timestamp FROM messages ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT name, email, age FROM patients WHERE age < 30 AND medical_history IS NOT NULL;

SELECT name, email, experience FROM cardiologists WHERE experience > 10 ORDER BY experience DESC;
SELECT patients.name, patients.age, messages.message_body FROM patients INNER JOIN messages ON patients.id = messages.receiver_id WHERE patients.age < 50;
SELECT * FROM cardiologists WHERE email LIKE '%@hospital.com';

SELECT cardiologists.name AS cardiologist_name, patients.name AS patient_name, messages.timestamp FROM cardiologists INNER JOIN patients ON cardiologists.id = patients.id INNER JOIN messages ON patients.id = messages.receiver_id ORDER BY messages.timestamp DESC;
